content: Fastener guide X-76-F-15 ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features Long-lasting and durable fastener guides for DX 76 powder-actuated nailer Applications Fastening composite metal decks to steel structures with a minimum thickness of 6 mm (1/4) for composite decking Fastening metal roof decks to steel structures with a minimum thickness of 6 mm (1/4) for roofing Fastening liner trays to steel structures with a minimum thickness of 6 mm (1/4) for siding Fastening grating elements to steel structures using grating accessories Fastening shear connectors on steel structures with HVB accessories ### TECHNICAL DATA: Fastener Intake: Single nail For use with (tools): DX 76 Additional Accessory Information: X-76-F-15 fastener guide for single decking fasteners Technical Data | Fastener Intake | Single nail | For use with (tools) | DX 76 | Additional Accessory Information | X-76-F-15 fastener guide for single decking fasteners ### ITEMS- 285483 - Fastener guide X-76-F-15 - Package Size 1 pc
